mapper.select: SELECT P.POFOL_NO as "pofol.pofolNo", P.POFOL_TITLE AS "pofol.pofolTitle", P.POFOL_PRICE AS "pofol.pofolPrice", S.CATEGORY_SMALL_NAME as "pofol.pofolService", P.POFOL_CONTENT AS "pofol.pofolContent", P.POFOL_VISITED AS "pofol.pofolVisited", P.POFOL_CREATE_DATE AS "pofol.pofolCreateDate", P.POFOL_STATUS AS "pofol.pofolStatus", P.GOSU_NO AS "pofol.gosuNo", P.POFOL_SERVICE AS "pofol.pofolService", PI.POFOL_IMG_URL AS firstImg, M.USER_PROFILE AS gosuImg, M.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickname FROM POFOL P LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM POFOL_IMG WHERE (POFOL_NO, POFOL_IMG_NO) IN (SELECT POFOL_NO, MIN(POFOL_IMG_NO) FROM POFOL_IMG GROUP BY POFOL_NO)) PI ON P.POFOL_NO = PI.POFOL_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT CATEGORY_SMALL_NO, CATEGORY_SMALL_NAME FROM SERVICE_CATEGORY_SMALL) S ON P.POFOL_SERVICE = S.CATEGORY_SMALL_NO LEFT JOIN (SELECT USER_NO, USER_PROFILE, USER_NICKNAME FROM MEMBER ) M ON M.USER_NO = P.GOSU_NO ORDER BY P.POFOL_VISITED DESC
mapper.insert: insert into REPORT (REPORT_NO, REPORTED_USER, REPORT_CATEGORY, REPORT_CONTENT, REPORT_STATUS, REPORT_USER) values (SEQ_REPORT_NO.nextval, #{reportedUser}, #{reportCategory}, #{reportContent}, 0,#{reportUser} )
